text: Helmut Krauch (2 May 1927 - October 14, 2010) was a German scientist who was known for his publications in systems theory and design theory and his works in conceptual art. He was a professor of system design at the University of Kassel, Germany. Krauch was born and died in Heidelberg, Germany. == Publications (selection)== * Computer-Democracy.
